name: UDiscoverMusicNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Following the music industry or want to hear the latest on what's happening with your favorite artists? Get the UDiscover Music News, and start getting informed. UDiscover Music News will automatically play as part of your Flash Briefing.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
